divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in my hot tub with my girlfriend and I seen something that I thought was a star. I noticed what I thought was a star because I remembered it from the night before. But tonight this object seemed to glow red and turn blue. I thought maybe it was an aircraft but it seemed to be hovering in one spot for along time. Finally this object seemed to be getting lower to the ground. I left and went back inside, and when I came back out, this object was nowhere to be seen.
trends: There have been 61 other sightings in Kokomo
There were no other sightings in Kokomo on or around September 17th 2003
